name: A2B Tracking Solutions
tag_list: uid, rfid, barcode, tracking, e-business, enterprise, web-services, dod, accountability
overview:
A2B Tracking Solutions manufactures barcode and RFID software and sells and supports selected software and hardware.

A2B specializes in turn-key solutions that business and government customers use to raise their level of internal accountability, improve customer service, and increase transparency in their operations.

A2B’s UID Solutions division is currently very active in supporting the U.S. Federal Government’s Department of Defense’ automated identification technology (AIT) initiative, which seeks to reduce costs and decrease delays in the military supply chain by providing electronic accountability of all valuable assets throughout their entire lifecycle.

A2B also provides tracking solutions for accountable mail, documents, assets, vehicles, people, and pretty much anything customers are interesting in keeping tabs on.
